summary: Improvements to POS stability, inventory accuracy, and internal security controls.

changes.title: Enhanced Inventory Validation
changes.description: Added validation checks to prevent incorrect inventory lot selection during POS transactions.
changes.impact: Improves inventory accuracy and reduces transaction errors.

changes.title: POS Transaction Stability
changes.description: Resolved silent transaction failures and improved error messaging when inventory configuration issues occur.
changes.impact: Increases transaction reliability during peak usage.

changes.title: Duplicate Inventory Movements
changes.description: Fixed edge cases where inventory movements could be registered more than once in multi-warehouse workflows.

changes.title: Root Credential Handling
changes.description: Improved internal workflows for root credential operations, including validation and logging.
changes.impact: Reduces operational risk and improves auditability.

known_limitations: POS users may need to refresh sessions to see updated validation messages after configuration changes.
action_required: No action required for most users. Administrators should review updated security procedures.
